dcterms:description: Split CIFAR-10 splits the original CIFAR-10 dataset into 5 disjoint subsets, where each subset comprises 2 classes.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: Split CIFAR-100 is constructed from the CIFAR-100 dataset, containing 10 tasks with disjoint class labels.
dcterms:title: Split CIFAR-100

dcterms:description: Split miniImageNet derives from the few-shot learning dataset miniImageNet, a subset of ImageNet with 100 classes and 600 images per class, divided equally to create 5 sequential tasks.
dcterms:title: Split miniImageNet
